#summary Xinc has the following requirements

= Requirements =


  * Subversion >=1.2(<1.2 needs to be verified)
  * Pear: VersionControl_SVN
  * Phing > 2.2
  * PHPUnit 3.x (optional)
  * pear needs to be in the includepath
  * For Web Frontend:
    * Apache or compatible with rewrite module + php5 support
